thread.section_title: Arbor City Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ok but not
thread.title_full: Ok but not - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: luxustrip
title: Ok but not
text:
Good functional hotel in a not so clean neighborhood. Clean. Not a four star though. Noisy rooms (even on the 5th Floor) street side. Reception staff unfriendly, doesn't seem to care much. Didn't have an idea about what's on, that they had any ' Where' magazine, whichI then found prominently displayed in the lobby. When I showed Julian, he just shrugged. Not a please nor a thank you, forget about a smile from reception staff.
Bar staff agreeable and polite.
Had to ask several days in a row to replenish my coffee bar ( with decaf).
Close to tube.
